Description_lang: Creating a Halo extends the duration of $?a137031[Apotheosis]?a228264[Voidform][Dark Ascension] by ${$s1/1000} sec. If $?a137031[Apotheosis]?a228264[Voidform][Dark Ascension] is not active, up to $454002U seconds is stored.While out of combat or affected by a loss of control effect, the duration of $?a137031[Apotheosis]?a228264[Voidform][Dark Ascension] is paused for up to $s2 sec.
